<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 16pt 16pt; text-indent: -16pt;"><b><span style="font-size:19.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">理解主流编程范式及其思想</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:19.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">(</span></b><b><span style="font-size:19.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">必修</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:19.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">)</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:19.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在编程范式上，我们需要理解编程语言的两个分类</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">——</span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">命令式编程和声明式编程</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">——</span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的设计思想。其中，非命令式的编程都可归为声明式编程，命令式、函数式和逻辑式是最核心的三种范式。可以用下图来表示。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-no-proof:yes"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">命令式编程和声明式编程起源的不同决定了这两大类范式代表着迥然不同的编程理念和风格：命令式编程是行动导向（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
Action-Oriented </span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">）的，因而算法是显性而目标是隐性的；声明式编程是目标驱动（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
Goal-Driven </span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">）的，因而目标是显性而算法是隐性的。以阶乘函数来示例，命令式、函数式和逻辑式的不同表现如下。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++ (</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">命令式</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">)</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
